name: generalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(someone who is) not specialized: Children of this age need specialist rather than generalist teachers.

Add to word list
HR someone who has a range of skills and knowledge: We need our managers to be generalists - people who understand the pressures of running a business.
offering a range of products or services: Most people ignore the benefits of widely spread generalist investment trusts.
